title: On what technologies does Cognizant train in the PAT program? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cognizant provides training in various technologies : Datawarehousing : In this training they teach you sql and pl/sql etc.This training lasts for 1.5–2 months.Java : Basic / advance concepts of Java +SQL. Also you have to prepare “My first real time Project” (MFRP) in a group fashion.. Net : C#+SQL. In this also you have to make MFRP.Testing : In this course they teach you basic concepts of manual testing, SQL, programming language like Java or c#, selenium IDE, selenium web driver, etc.After completion of training by clearing all exit tests, they will allocate you to projects on different domains like : Traveling and Hospitality (T&H)Banking and FinanceHealthcareInsurance, etc.All the best!!

It may be anything ranging from .NET, Java, UI frameworks, Data warehousing, Testing or even business analyst training.. It all depends on which technology is the need of the hour for various projects in the company. Hope this clarifies. My advise would be to open to any tech and then self learn your preferred tech in case you don't get trained on that.
